remarks: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit class substitution, using a bound-variable hypothesis instead of distinct variables. (Closed theorem version of ~ sbciegf .)  (Contributed by NM, 10-Nov-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2016.)
statement:
sbciegft $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ F/ x ps /\ A. x ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) ) -> ( [. A / x ]. ph <-> ps ) ) $.
$d A x $.
